basic.description: This is a one-semester course encompassing the topics of MAC 1140 (Pre-calculus Algebra) and MAC 1114 (Analytic Trigonometry). See the topics for MAC 1140 and MAC 1114.
basic.subject: MAC
basic.title: Precalculus Algebra/Trigonometry

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite: MAC 1105 or suitable mathematics examination placement score.
